about.title: Hi, I’m Selina!
about.desc: hi!! i'm selina, currently a student studying cs in the hopes the job market miraculously improves. i love books (check my goodreads), online shopping, and movie trivia
message-variants: i played the clarinet in my high school marching band but i was really terrible at it

projects.title: Reddit Search Engine
projects.desc: With a group of 5, developed an information retrieval pipeline by crawling ~500MB of Reddit data, indexing with PyLucene (BM25 ranking plus recency and upvotes). Includes a Flask web interface for user queries across pop culture subreddits. If you want to know what the Reddit discourse was on your favorite reality show, this search engine will display the top posts!

projects.title: Terminal Chess
projects.desc: A terminal-based chess game built in C++ with a group of 4. Includes full chess-rule support and game logic like piece movement, legal move validation, and check & checkmate detection. Play in 2-player mode in the command line!

projects.title: Movie Trivia Game
projects.desc: A command-line movie trivia quiz game built in C++. It quizzes users on matching film quotes to movies and vice versa. It keeps score and validates user input. The game ends when you get three wrong answers!
